comments.body: the `copy` semantics of Categorical are weird (#26995).  Can you check that when you do `__setitem__` below it actually alters the appropriate objects (and only the appropriate ones)?
I can confirm that after `__setitem__`, `expected` has its third element changed but `c` doesn't, as intended
